labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The audit log reports that the "Read Messages" setting was modified (probably just an oversight).
data.expected_result: I would expect the audit log to report that the "View Channel" permission was modified.
data.short_description: Modifying the "View Channel" permission incorrectly records as "Read Messages" in the audit logs.
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on the settings cog for a voice channel. - Select the Permissions tab. - Change the new "View Channel" permission to allow or deny. - Go to Server Settings and select "Audit Log" to view how it records.
